general

Class TurnSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • general.TurnSystem

  • public class TurnSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages whose turn it is for any number of Players.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int index
      The index in players of the next Player to have their turn.
      private java.util.List<Player> players
      Holds all of the players currently being managed by this object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TurnSystem(Player... players)
      Creates a new TurnSystem.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Player p)
      Adds another player such that they will take the next turn.
      Player next()
      Gets the player whose turn it is.
      void remove(Player p)
      Removes a player from the TurnSystem.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • players

        private java.util.List<Player> players
        Holds all of the players currently being managed by this object.

      • index

        private int index
        The index in players of the next Player to have their turn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TurnSystem

        public TurnSystem(Player... players)
        Creates a new TurnSystem.
        Parameters:
        players - The players to add to this TurnSystem initially.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Player p)
        Adds another player such that they will take the next turn.
        Parameters:
        p - The player to add.

      • remove

        public void remove(Player p)
        Removes a player from the TurnSystem. If the removed player would have had their turn next, the turn goes to the next player.
        Parameters:
        p - The player to remove.

      • next

        public Player next()
        Gets the player whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        The player whose turn it is.
